name: HyperFlow
description:
Get ready to shoot evil red cubes and enjoy particle explosions in this retro-inspired first person shooter!!! Your enemies are spreading fast and you must destroy as many as posible before they defeat you... How long will you survive?

Easy! You have to destroy all evil red cubes you see and be sure the bar on top of the screen doesn't get full! 

We are a small team of developers who love to make games in their free time. This game was made for a 40h gamejam which theme was "you're just an illusion". We ended up winning and we are really proud of what we managed to do with this game. We really, really, really hope you like it! And as always: we are very pasionate about what we do and we would love to hear your opinion!

You can find us here!

Feel free to email us at: firsttrystudios@gmail.com
